value.description: Upset by the killing of his dog, the canine's owner, Oscar Herrera, 32, allegedly confronted the Hillsdale County sheriff’s deputy with a knife. The deputy then shot Herrera, police said ...

value.name: Deputy kills attacking dog, then kills angry owner, police say
value.description: The dog’s owner, 32-year-old Oscar Herrera, was upset the deputy shot his dog and confronted him armed with a knife, according to police. The deputy shot Herrera as well, police said.

value.name: US police officer kills dog after being bitten, fatally shoots owner who had knife
value.description: "The deputy fired shots at the dog, which resulted in killing the dog." The deputy also shot the dog's owner, Oscar Herrera, after he confronted the deputy with a knife, state police said.
